name: Colour-less
description:
Submission to Mini Jam: Colors!

Hi! Thanks for checking out this page! This is my First Game Jam and my first Game, ever! I'm hoping to continue to make more games :].

Details:

Time taken: 35 to 40 ~ hours [start 23nd]

Programs used:

Clip Studio Paint [Art]

RPGMaker VX ACE [Game]

Game Length:  15 ~ minutes

RTP included and RTP excluded versions in downloads.

Credits:

Art, Writing, Making game [Me]

Music/Sound Effects/GUI [ RPGMAKER VX ACE]

Really excited for feedback on the game! I want to know how I could improve with projects in the future  :].
